input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt

Item features:
100% Polyester
Quality tested and ensured for maximum durability
Designed with only the toughest, roughest users in mind
Comfort and Performance come hand in hand with Rothco

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is made of high-quality polyester and is designed to withstand tough and rigorous use. Its durable construction ensures that it will last a long time. The shirt is comfortable to wear and provides a perfect fit. It has a stylish design that makes it perfect for casual wear. The Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is the perfect choice for any occasion.
input_text.Response B: Rothco P/T Marines T-Shirt is a performance shirt designed for the toughest, roughest users in mind. The P/T Marines T-Shirt is made of 100% polyester and is designed for maximum durability. The comfort and performance come hand in hand with Rothco. This is a highly durable and long-lasting T-shirt.
